document_data.name: Sulduskoon River
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Sulduskoon River''' was a major river in the kingdom of [[Tethyr]].<ref name=LoI:T-p56/> This spring-fed river flowed west from the highlands<ref name=LoI:T-p56/> all the way into the ocean at the [[Bay of Bormul]] in [[Zazesspur]].<ref name=LoI1:T-frontcover>
{{TOC limit}}
document_data.Description: The river was wide and slow-moving.
document_data.Etymology: The river received its name from the tribe of [[Suldusk]] [[Elf|elves]] living within the [[Forest of Tethir]].
document_data.History: Circa {{Yearlink|-2600}}, the last survivors of [[High Shanatar]] were slain by [[Calishite]]s on the shore of the Sulduskoon.<ref name=TGHotR-p31>
